div.p:
Curia legalis balliuorum burgi de Aberdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xvjo die Nouembris
Anno Domini et cetera lxxiio

quo die Alexander blindsel patricius badenagh . Thomas de camera
et Johannes vaus alias quatuor balliui sepe vocati tanquam secundo die huius processus
ad sectam Thome simonis pro iniusta detencione ab eodem xlix s' et vj d' . Non comparuerunt
quare precipitur seriando et cetera

How morison and his wif and Johne thomson of the brig ar oblist coniunctlie
and seueraly In presence of the bailyeis in Jugement tocontent and pay til gilbert
morison ane half barrel of salmounde and twa lax betuix this write and
mydsummyr next tocum or within viii dais thareftir vnreprevit And failye
and of the payment as said is / the forsaidis personis and ilkane of thaim ar oblist
the dais of payment being Runnyn ./ that the forsaid gilbert sal Jurnay
thame at his wil for the payment of the said salmond but ony mare
process' of law in tyme tocum et cetera

Eodem die Johannes fichet de Kep sepe vocatus ad sectam Alexandri howison tanquam
secundo die huius processus . pro iniusta detencione ab eodem vnius barelle salmonum
prout continetur in precedenti processu Non comparuit / quare precipitur seriando et cetera

Quo die Andreas moir sepe vocatus ad sectam Dauidis howison tanquam
tercio die huius processus pro iniusta detencione ab eodem de xxix s' g' veluti
in superiori processu continetur Non comparuit / quare precipitur seriando quod capiat
districtum ab eodem ad valorem amerciamenti curie Et ad premuniendum eundem ad quartum
diem processus et cetera
Curia tenta per balliuos in pretorio burgi de Abirdene xviiio die Nouembris anno supradicto

quo die patricius smyth in amerciamento curie pro iniusta detencione v s' a Johanne lammyn
toune . et satisfaciet eidem infra terminum Juris

Eodem die Wischeard in fotino in amerciamento curie pro iniusta perturbacione Alexandri fraser
et emendabit eidem veluti Jura volunt et cetera

Item eodem die Thomas campsy per assisam iuratam adiudicatur in amerciamento curie
pro iniusta detencione vnius corone auree monete francie valoris xij s' et vj d'
a gilberto vaus quam satisfaciet eidem infra terminum Juris

Quo die peterkyn Wischard de fotino calmpniatus de perturbio facto Alexandro
frasar de fotino et conuictus per assisam Ordinatum fuit et decretum per ballivos
cum consensu dicti peterkyn tempore emende facte dicto Alexandro quod quocumque perturba
uerit seu forisfecerit dicto Alexandro in suo defectu vel famulibus suis sine
cuicumque vicino in fotino commorante quo expulsus erit de villa nuncquam
iterum Reuersurus et cetera

In curia tenta per balliuos burgi de Aberdene in pretorio eiusdem xxmo die mensis
Nouembris Anno Domini et cetera lxxijo

quo die lindesay harold tanquam tercio
die huius processus sepe vocatus ad intrare faciendum Alexandrum lindesay
pro quo deuenit plegius ad sectam Dauidis hil Non comparuit / quare precipitur
seriando quod capiat districtum ab eodem ad valorem amerciamenti Regij et cetera

Eodem die actio inter henricum Wricht et Johannem Wricht Respectuatur
cum parcium consensibus per prepositum et consilium commune statu quo nunc vsque aduen
tum domini de Inuerugy absque preiudicio parcium

The xxj day of Nouembre the yere forwritin henry scherel tutor dative
be oure soueran lordis lettres til William androson son' and ayr to quhilum
James androson burges of this burgh . In presence of the Aldirman and
Counsel . consentit and assentit that Davy gethane sal Remain with that
lande of quhilum James androsonnis / of the quhilk the said Davy has
tayn possessioune quhil he be payt of fourty pundis of the vsuale
money of Scotland . eftir the tenour of his chartir . made to him tharwpon

The same day In presence of the Aldirman and Consel the forsaid Henry scherel
is admittit be Johne androson . and all vthiris frendis belangande
the forsaid William andirson beand present in the tyme til intromet with the forsaid Wil . his Ayrschip
and with all vthiris gudis pertening til him . baith landis annualis and
his malys and fermys togiddre and forto forse and helpe with al vthiris gudis pertening til all the lave
of the barnys of vmquhile James androson and the said henryis sistiris / as
tutour dative ordand be oure souerane lordis lettres vndir his quhite walx
togiddre with vthiris lettres vndir his signet And in alsfer as the said henry
scherel Ressavis of the said Williamis gudis or his sisteris . he has fundin
Davy gethan souertie . that thai gudis salbe furth cumande to the proffite of
the barnys . quhen thai cum tolaghfull age And it is toremembre that nocht
withstanding . that it is aboue writin that the said henry sulde forsee and hafe
interess' in the lave of the barnys gudis . the said henry desiris nocht til intromet
with ony vthiris gudis bot with the landis and gudis and annualis pertening to the
said William son' and ayr til vmquhile James androson' eftir the tenour of
the power of his letter of tutory dative gefin yil him tharwpon of oure
souerane lordis chapel And with the consent of the said Johne androson burges
of Aberdene eldast fadir brothir to the forsaid William androson'

Vicesimo septimo die Nouembris Anno Domini et cetera lxxijo Coram preposito ballivis et
consilio burgi de Aberdene in pretorio Johannes striueling de breky Inuenit
Duncanum sanquhare de murcroft plegium legalem pro eo quod frater Johannes
peblis ordinis sancte trinitatis erit indempnis de ipso Johanne et suis Impetracionibus
aliter quam exigit ordo Juris Et dictus frater Johannes de peblis Inuenit
Johannem de scrogs burgensem de Aberdene plegium legalem pro eo quod prefatus
Johannes striueling et filij sui erunt indempnes de ipso fratre Johanne et suis
inherentibus preter quam comunem viam Juris
In Curia tenta per balliuos in pretorio de Aberdene xxviiio die Nouembris anno et cetera lxxijo

quo die Wilelmus quelp in amerciamento curie per assisam iuratam pro iniusta porrectione
plegii super Duncanum sanquhare de murcroft et cetera

Eodem die Duncanus sanquhar de murcroft calumpniatus per Wilelmum
quelp incolam . huius burgi . per plegium in manibus philippi de Dunbrek
porrect' super iniustis apercione camere sue et capcione vnius barelle salmonum
de eadem quam calumpniam dictus Duncanus negabat Vnde assisa
desuper electa et iurata dictus Duncanus sanquhar' a calumpnia pre
notata quitus declaratur et immunis

Item Willelmus quelp in amerciamento pro iniusta perturbacione Duncani sanquhar de
murcroft in verbo et emendabit eidem prout Jura volunt

the same day William quelp has Resingit in presence of the Aldirman and consel
in the tolbuthe all and sindrie his landis and specialy the lande liand in the
gallowgate pertening til him in the quhilk the said Williamis modir now
dwellis and inhabitis in the handis of Johne the vaus ane of the bailyes
of this burgh tofreith the said Johne of a borowgang in the quhilk
the said William has made him tocum for him til Duncan sanquhar of
murcroft anent xij s' if siluer tobe pait to the said Duncan within xv dais
next folowand and a barrel of salmond be the feist of Witsunday
thareftir immediatly fortocum aucht be the said William til the larde
of murcroft forwritin but ony langar delay excepcione fraude or
gile et cetera

Die primo Decembris anno et cetera lxxijo Alexander sanquhar per assisam adiudicatur satis
facere cuidam Wilelmo swape quadraginta le Wethyn ferri debit' eidem
infra terminum Juris et cetera in amerciamento curie pro iniusta detencione dicti ferri ab eodem

In curia ballivorum decimo quinto die Decembris anno et cetera lxxiio Willelmus huntar in amerciamento curie
pro iniusta perturbacione Cristini litstar verbotenus et tenetur emendare ad visum proborum
Et eciam dictus cristinus in amerciamento pro perturbacione predicti Willelmi et emendabit eidem ut supra

The same day Sandy glutory in amerciament for the wrangwis' breking and casting
downe of a swynis crufe belanging the videu of quhilum Wil of bughan baxtar
and the said sandy is ordanit tomak wp the said crufe agane als' sufficiantlie
as it was of before and toamend the scaith to the said woman as law wil

Decimosexto die mensis Decembris anno supradicto Thomas campsy in amerciamento pro iniusta
detencione trium solidorum a Johanne lang skynnar pro plegiagio penes Jacobum Kemp
et tenetur satisfacere dicto Johanni infra terminum Juris

Johannes lang skynnar predictus in amerciamento pro iniusta porrectione plegij super Johannem cathkyn
de iiibus solidis penes fideiussionem ut asseruit pro dicto Jacobo Kep auri fabro
Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio xxij Decembris anno prescripto

Megota de Wentoune
assedata Nicholai liel in amerciamento pro iniusta perturbacione et dispersione cristiane prestoune
et tenetur emendare Et dicta cristiana in amerciamento pro perturbacione dicte megate et te
netur emendare eidem

The same day the Assise has ordand that maistir Johne of pennycuke sal pay
and content to Nicol liel that was servand til him alsmekle fee as he promittit
til him fra the tym that the said Nicol may preve that he was feit his man and
servand vnto settirday the xix day of this present moneth last bypast
quhen the said maistir Johne dischargit the said Nicol of his service

Eodem die magister Johannes de pennycuke dedit philippum de Dunbrek sergeandum
burgi plegium legalem quod non dampnabit Nicolaum liel per ipsum aut suam proc
uracionem preter quam Juris ordine Et modo consimili dictus nicholaus Inuenit thomam
simson burgensem huius burgi plegium quod prefatus magister Johannes erit illesus de eodem nisi
secundum exigenciam Juris

In curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio penultimo die Decembris anno predicto Johannes og in amerciamento
pro iniusta perturbacione et percussione Duncani scot et tenetur emendare dampnum eidem
Et dictus Duncanus in amerciamento quia iniuste perturbauit dictum Johannem in verbo et emendabit vt prius

Eodem die Dauid holby et Andreas branche calumpniati pro iniusta perturbacione et
lesione magistri Johannis de pennycuke sub noctis silencio negauerunt dictam
iniustam perturbacionem prefati magistri Johannis Vnde assisa desuper Jurata decreuit
dictos Dauid et Andream et eosdem deliberauit fuisse et esse iniuste
perturban' et convict' pro lesione eiusdem propter quod ipsorum quilibet in amerciamento curie
adiudicatur et emendare eidem de dampno iuxta ordinacionem proborum pro huiusmodi
perturbacione et lesione dicti magistri Johannis sub nocte veluti predictus fuit

Et dictus magister Johannes convictus pro iniusta perturbacione prefatorum Dauidis
et Andree et emendabit eisdem secundum consideracionem proborum virorum

Die secundo Januarij anno et cetera lxxiio Johannes trail in amerciamento curie pro perturbacione
et percussione edmundi Donaldson et tenetur emendare dampnum

Eodem die edmundus lowson nomine et ex parte filij sui adiudicatur in amerciamento pro iniusta
perturbacione vnius filij Johannis Wrycht et emendam fieri faciet eidem et cetera

Item dictus Johannes Wricht posuit ipsum in voluntate balliuorum de amerciamento curie
pro inquietacione et perturbacione prefati edmundi lowson vicinj ville et confratris
gilde et emendabit dampnum iuxta ordinem proborum Eciam decretus fuit
per assisam tempore emende et deliberatus ac per ballivos in curia ordinata
quod se de cetero idem Johannes Wrycht in defectu suo perturbium faciat iniuste
cuicumque vicino confratri gilde huius burgi et precipue dicto edmundo quo
Nota si contingat idem Johannes soluet . quinque marcas absque Remissione ad voluntatem ballivo
rum de eodem leuand'

Curia balliuorum burgi de Aberdene tenta in pretorio per ballivos die quinto
mensis Januarij anno et cetera lxxijo

quo die Robertus de buchan burgensis
dicti burgi adiudicatur in amerciamento curie quia iniuste perturbavit Thomam ma
liceson in detencione famule dicti thome prout Inuentum fuit per assisam et cetera

Eodem die Alexander fresal in fotino adiudicatur in amerciamento quia perturbauit iniuste
Adam hervy quare tenetur emendare eidem de dampno et cetera

add.foreign: dominus andreas de choro et cetera

div.p:
The aucht day of the moneth of Januar' the yere of god Mmo iiijcmo sevintye and twa
Androu scherar' Aldirman of the burgh of Aberdene in that tyme with consent and assent of
the hail common' consel being than present in the tolbuthe has gravntit and promittit to Schir
Androu theson' of quhilum Thomas androson burges of aberdene chaplan' of the Rude
altar in the parisch kirk of the said burgh that for his continuacione of divine service tobe
done and made be him in tyme tocum in Sanct Nicholes kirk eftir as the tyme askis
at his gude diligence and power that the said ser Androw sal hafe yerlie for his fie ten merkis
of the vsuale money of scotland of the common' gudis of the forsaid burgh togiddre with
all annualis proffitis and dewiteis pertening to the fornemmit Rude altar quhilk soume
and pencion' of x merkis yerlie togiddre with the Rude altar the forsaid ser Androw sal
hafe and Jois' for all the tyme of his life he makand besy and gude service
tharfor as forsaid is

The same day the Aldirman and consel has promittit and gravntit til Schir Henry
hervy chaplane of Sanct Michalis altar for his gude service and continuacione
tharof tobe done be him in tyme tocum In sanct Nicholes kirk in divine service that
he sal hafe for all the daijs of his life yerlie of the common purs' and of the common
gude of the said burgh sex pundis threttene schillingis and foure pennys of the
vsuale payment of scotland togiddre with all proffitis and dewiteis pertening til
the forsaid altar of Sanct Michael et cetera

Item alexander of chavmer than aldirman and the consel has ordanit and assignit at the request
and instans of ser henry hervy that his said pensioune of this ton' sal be pait
til him yerly of the Justice myln et cetera Actum xxviijo septembris anno et cetera lxxv

The ix day of Januar' the yer' et cetera lxxij andro alanson comperit before the Aldir
man and certane of the consel of Aberdene in the tolbuthe / and protestit solemptly
that the compromys made of before betuix him and Alexander trail his sister son'
sulde turne him to na preiudice sen the Arbitrouris that war chosin tharto
has nocht deliuerit nor decidit the caus' debatabil betuix him and the said
alexander And the said Androw protestit that the said compromys sulde be adnullit
and expirit In it self for the caus' forsaid

The same day before Aldirman bailyes and diuers' of the common consel in the
tolbuthe Johne Wormot burges of Aberdene perofferit him to vndirly the
sentence and Jugement of law before his Juge ordinare anent all ac
tiounez and clame that ony man mycht hafe or say til him belanging
ony maner' of gudis with the quhilkis he had intromettit of gilbert of
Kyntorris quham god assoilye /. and that he was redy tovndirly a knaw
lege and determinacione of his nychbouris tharwpon' of the quhilk peroffer
he askit the copy tobe deliuerit til him vndir a bailyes seil et cetera
